songs.title: America Has A Problem (Cocaine)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
America, America, America has a problem
Cocaine
Do you believe in love at first sight?
The first time I saw you, I fell in love

[Verse 1]
There's a white girl in town, name is Cocaine
Get inside your brain, play you like a lame
Yeah, you on her good side 'cause she make you rich
The first time you hit her, break you like a brick
Dress you up and go, the folks know you with her
They can lock you up, but what do they do with her?
They put you in a cell, while you countin' sheep
They slip her out the back door, back to the street
This process partner, you will never know
Twenty years up the river, that girl made you go
She's back into the hands of a young black male
Treat the sucker good, make the sucker sell
Cocaine

[Bridge]
Do you believe in love at first sight? (Cocaine)
The first time I saw you, I fell in love (Cocaine)

[Verse 2]
Cocaine says she loves you, but she really don't
She say "I'll always be there", but she really won't
Make you a big man, buy you a Uzi
She say "Go kill your brother, or you gonna lose me"
You don't wanna lose her so you do what you are told
Headed for the chair, sixteen years old
Now you're in too deep, and you can't come back
Well that's what you get for selling that crack
Cocaine

[Bridge]
Do you believe in love, do you believe in love at first sight?
The first time I saw you, I fell in love

[Verse 3]
First you're on the bottom, you didn't have nothing
She bought you a ride and an automatic weapon
Clothes on your body, gold's in your mouth
Twelve different girls in a house down south
In this game you win M.V.P
Most valuable player in the dope industry
You get a call one morning, got a shipment coming in
You try to flex it off, so you take your lady friend
Get to the airport, the dope is in your hand
Freeze is the and, a badge in your face
If he loans to your girlfriend, the answer's very simple
And quite blank, she got jealous of your girl
Cocaine

[Bridge]
Do you believe in love at first sight? (Cocaine)
The first time I saw you, I fell in love (Cocaine)
Do you believe, do you believe, do you believe in love at first sight?
The first time I saw you, I fell in love (Cocaine)
Do you believe in love at first sight? (Cocaine)
The first time I saw you, I fell in love (Cocaine)

[Verse 4]
People killing babies, ladies gettin' raped
Little teenage kids pushing cocaine out the state
The black man have a fantasy, cocaine is the insanity
Come out of that dream, back to reality
Look what it's doing to the people on the street
Can't eat, can't sleep, just geek, geek, geek
Cocaine
